jasonxu.lazyAudio.name: Lazy Load
jasonxu.lazyAudio.setVolume: Set the volume of the container [R] to [VOL]
jasonxu.lazyAudio.playFrom: play audio in container [R] from the [SEC] second
jasonxu.lazyAudio.setSeek: set seek of audio in container [R] to [SEC]
jasonxu.lazyAudio.setRate: set rate of audio in container [R] to [RATE]
jasonxu.lazyAudio.loop: set loop playback of files in container [R] to [TF]
